pageContext.claim: “You know, Jimmy Carter's oftentimes come to my defense. I don't necessarily agree with the way he ran things and that's okay. And he understands that and so do I. But he came to my defense on numerous occasions. And he thinks that I was treated the worst of anybody he's ever seen by the press.”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no proof to suggest this is true. Instead, the former president came close to calling Trump’s presidency illegitimate during an event in January of 2019. When asked about Russian interference in the 2016 election, Carter said, “[Trump] lost the election and he was put into office because the Russians interfered on his behalf.”
